com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.api

Class Descriptor

  • Object
    • com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.api.Descriptor

  • public final class Descriptor
extends Object
    Describes a service. A descriptor is a set of calls descriptors that the service provides, coupled with metadata about how the service and its calls are to be served. Metadata may include versioning and migrations, SLA's, sharding hints, circuit breaker strategies etc.

      • locatableService

        public boolean locatableService()
        Whether this is a locatable service. Locatable services are registered with the service locator and/or gateway, so that they can be consumed by other services. Services that are not locatable are typically services for infrastructure purposes, such as providing metrics.

      • withAutoAcl

        public Descriptor withAutoAcl(boolean autoAcl)
        Set whether the service calls in this descriptor should default to having an ACL automatically generated for them. By default, this will not happen. Note that each service call can override this by calling withAutoAcl on them.
        Parameters:
        autoAcl - Whether autoAcl should be true.
        Returns:
        A copy of this descriptor.

      • with

        public Descriptor with(ServiceAcl... acls)
        Add the given manual ACLs. If auto ACLs are configured, these will be added in addition to the auto ACLs.
        Parameters:
        acls - The ACLs to add.
        Returns:
        A copy of this descriptor.

      • replaceAllAcls

        public Descriptor replaceAllAcls(org.pcollections.PSequence<ServiceAcl> acls)
        Replace all the ACLs with the given ACL sequence. This will not replace ACLs generated by autoAcl, to disable autoAcl, turn it off.
        Parameters:
        acls - The ACLs to use.
        Returns:
        A copy of this descriptor.

      • withProtocolNegotiationStrategy

        public Descriptor withProtocolNegotiationStrategy(HeaderTransformer protocolNegotiationStrategy)

      • withServiceIdentificationStrategy

        public Descriptor withServiceIdentificationStrategy(HeaderTransformer serviceIdentificationStrategy)

      • withLocatableService

        public Descriptor withLocatableService(boolean locatableService)
        Set whether this service is locatable. Locatable services are registered with the service locator and/or gateway, so that they can be consumed by other services. Services that are not locatable are typically services for infrastructure purposes, such as providing metrics.
        Parameters:
        locatableService - Whether this service should be locatable or not.
        Returns:
        A copy of this descriptor.
